title: One Piece: Araburu Henkaku no Log: Anyaku Suru Kakumeigun!
content:
It feels very weird to have a revolutionary arm focused recap episode as if they have done much in the story, it turned out, they did.

Special episode number 15 is yet another Egghead arc recap that starts off by re-introducing Ivankov and ending by whatever befalls Sabo on Lulucia.

I guess it’s fun to have Sabo narrate the episode, someone who’s not much screened in the show, and focus on the side least shown in One Piece, fun to see the story through the lens of the revolutionaries’ shenanigans.

Although I guess the Dressrosa portion took way too much time from the episode, but perhaps it’s atelling that Sabo really saved the revolutionary arm plot.

Please Dragon, don’t be a fraud!
